title: Manifesto for Software Craftsmanship
introduction: As aspiring Software Craftsmen we are raising the bar of professional software development by practicing it and helping others learn the craft.  Through this work we have come to value:
conclusion: That is, in pursuit of the items on the left we have found the items on the right to be indispensable.
this_statement_may_be_freely_copied_in_a: this statement may be freely copied in any form,
but_only_in_its_entirety_through_this_no: but only in its entirety through this notice.
